about.title: About Scam Watch
about.missionText: Scam Watch is dedicated to empowering consumers by providing a platform to report and track price gouging incidents. We believe in fair pricing practices and consumer protection.
about.howToUseText: Report price gouging incidents you encounter, verify others' reports, and use the information to make informed purchasing decisions.
about.contactText: Have questions or suggestions? Reach out to us.
